class sherlock.imports.pessto_marshall_streams.pessto_marshall_streams(log, settings=False, pathToDataFile=False, version=False, catalogueName='', coordinateList=[], cataloguesDbConn=False)[source] ∞

Bases: sherlock.imports._base_importer._base_importer

The worker class for the pessto_marshall_streams module

Key Arguments:
  • dbConn – mysql database connection
  • log – logger
  • settings – the settings dictionary
  • pathToDataFIle – path to the pessto_marshall_streams data file
  • version – version of the pessto_marshall_streams catalogue
